author: Staff Reporter
text:
Members of flying aquad seized unaccounted cash totalling Rs. 9.50 lakh from a woman from Bengaluru here on Saturday.

The members on vehicle check in tollgate intercepted a car and found the cash.

The woman, Susheelamma from Bengaluru, said that she was carrying the money to handover to her relatives in Kanchipuram for purchase of dress materials.

However, she could not produce any valid documents for the cash. Hence, officials seized the money.
title: Unaccounted cash seized
